paper_abstract: State-of-the-art supply chain management systems can be obtained from the supply chain operations reference model for business applications, advancement and practices. Problematic management processes in standard process reference model form improves competitive advantage, communication, dimensions, management, control and alter to a specific purpose among the supply chain management processes. This helps organizations capture the "as-is" state of a process with the objective of achieving the desired "to-be "future state. This paper presents supply chain management efforts, key challenges and opportunities in pakistan's industrial and organizational most successful sector and span of business from seed to smoke' by deploying the eminent supply chain operations reference-model.
paper_title: A SCOR reference model of the supply chain management system in an enterprise
